FirstStep.Title: Congrats!
FirstStep.Text:
Congrats!  You logged in!  Welcome {FirstName}!  Today is a new day and you got this!  We are 100% on your side and if you follow this A-Z resource plan for bio moms, you WILL get your kids back faster and then we promise to help you THRIVE post reunification as well.

So are you READY?  Let's do this!!!

StepA.Title: Step A
StepA.Text:
Fantastic, just a couple of questions… 

Do you use any mind altering substances to cope with your emotions or situations currently in your life?

StepA-1.Title: Step A

StepA-2.Title: Step A
StepA-2.Text: Has it been noted in your case plan that there are suspicions of drug use and have you been asked to do a drug screen?

StepA-2-1.Title: Step A
StepA-2-1.Text: Did you pass or fail the test?

StepA-2-2.Title: Step A
StepA-2-2.Text: No Problem! Life is sometimes crazy busy and near overwhelming isn’t it?  Your Peer mentor will work with your case manager to get you to a drug screening. Check back here once you know the result.
